text: 5.3.1 Pipes and their supports must be electrochemically compatible or be electrolytically separated (refer to Table 2).
spaced_lrml: if( has( pipe, support)), then( obligation( or( and( in between( compatibility, and( pipe, support)), is( compatibility. type, electrochemical)), and( in between( separation, and( pipe, support)), is( separation. type, electrolytical), as per( separation, nzbc g12as2 t2)))))

text: 3.3.1 Solar water heaters must have a minimum of 50 litres of hot water storage per square metre of collector area.
spaced_lrml: if( exist( solar water heater)), then( and( obligation( and( has( solar water heater, hot water storage), has( solar water heater, solar collector), define( solar collector. area, x0), greater than equal( hot water storage. capacity, '50 l * x0')))))

text: Trench 3.9.6 Placing and compacting a) Granular bedding and selected fill shall be placed in layers of no greater than 100 mm loose thickness and compacted.
spaced_lrml: if( or( exist( granular material), exist( selected fill))), then( obligation( and( within( granular bedding, layer), within( selected fill, layer), less than equal( layer. thickness, 100 mm), is( layer, compacted))))
